title: SIA 416 Area Classification
description: Swiss SIA 416 standard for area definitions in buildings. Used for building permits, rent calculations, and energy reference area (EBF) determination.

area_type.description: SIA 416 area type: GF=Geschossfläche, NGF=Nettogeschossfläche, NNF=Nettowohnfläche, VF=Verkehrsfläche, FF=Funktionsfläche, KF=Konstruktionsfläche, AGF=Anrechenbare Geschossfläche, UGF=Untergeschossfläche

is_heated.description: Whether this area is thermally conditioned (relevant for EBF/EWG calculations)

is_energy_reference_area.description: Whether this area counts towards the energy reference area (Energiebezugsfläche, EBF)

usage_de.description: Usage description in German (e.g. Wohnen, Büro, Gewerbe)

cantonal_zone.description: Cantonal zone classification (e.g. W2, WG3, G)
